meanings.definition: A substance used to kill or repel pests or insects.
meanings.sent1: The disinfestants sprayed in the kitchen helped get rid of the ants.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use disinfestants to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The ants threw a party in the pantry until the disinfestants crashed it.
meanings.sent4: The disinfestants acted like a shield, protecting the plants from the invading pests.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the disinfestants lingered in the air, ensuring no bugs dared to come near.

meanings.definition: Agents that eliminate or control infestations of pests.
meanings.sent1: The disinfestants were effective in clearing out the termite infestation.
meanings.sent2: Exterminators rely on disinfestants to manage pest problems in homes.
meanings.sent3: The disinfestants worked so well that even the mice left apology notes.
meanings.sent4: The disinfestants swept through the house like a silent army, eradicating all pests.
meanings.sent5: The power of the disinfestants was evident as the pests vanished without a trace.
